DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform randomize controlled-trial investigate start cervical ripen outpatient set mechanical method , transcervical Foley catheter . This pilot study establish efficacy method decrease time inpatient evaluate patient satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: Outpatient Foley For Starting Induction Labor TErm
DOC.detailed_description: Induction labor necessary one-fourth woman large proportion require cervical ripening . Cervical ripen necessary shorten time delivery increase chance vaginal delivery . Outpatient cervical ripen attractive alternative woman physician decrease amount time spend hospital opportunity patient comfort home . The investigator conduct randomize controlled trial compare outpatient inpatient cervical ripen use transcervical Foley catheter . Women randomize undergo inpatient outpatient transcervical Foley catheter cervical ripen beyond 39th week gestation . Women infant follow time discharge .
DOC.criteria: Age ≥18 Multiparous Singleton gestation Gestational age 39+0 42+0 Vertex presentation Cervix ≤ 3 cm . If cervix 2 3 cm dilate , must < 80 % efface No prior cesarean section uterine surgery Resides within Jefferson County , Alabama . Access telephone Reliable transportation Unsuitable outpatient Foley placement management ( IUGR , oligohydramnios , prior cesarean delivery , gestational hypertension , preeclampsia , uncontrolled chronic hypertension , complex maternal disease , provider discretion ) . Any patient pregestational gestational diabetes medication exclude .
